attributes.review: The app has crashed on me multiple times today. And the layout of the app looks like it was made by a 2 year old. Could’ve been better if it was about someone decent.

attributes.review: I first saw advertisements for this app and decided to check it out. But after I downloaded it, my phone’s battery started to drain in a third of the time it normally did. All of my apps ran slower and it allowed VIRUSES AND BUGS to get on my phone. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!
